verifyUser: select id_user from security.user WHERE na_user = $1
verifyBlock: SELECT bl_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
verifyAttempts: SELECT at_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
selectPassUser: SELECT pw_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
restoreIntentos: UPDATE security.user SET at_user = 3 WHERE na_user = $1
disminuirIntentos: UPDATE security.user SET at_user = at_user - 1 WHERE na_user = $1
verifyIntentos: SELECT at_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
bloquear: UPDATE security.user SET bl_user = true, at_user = 0 WHERE na_user = $1
getDataSession: SELECT uw.id_user, uw.na_user, uw.ma_user FROM security.user uw WHERE uw.na_user = $1
obtenerPermisos: SELECT p.de_profile profile, m.na_method method, o.na_object object, mo.na_module area FROM security.permission pe INNER JOIN security.profile p ON p.id_profile = pe.id_profile INNER JOIN security.method m ON m.id_method = pe.id_method INNER JOIN security.object o ON o.id_object = m.id_object INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = o.id_module
addUser: INSERT INTO security.user (na_user, pw_user, ma_user, im_user, id_person, id_status_user) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) RETURNING id_user
seeUser: SELECT na_user as user, ma_user as email FROM security.user WHERE user = $1
verifyMethod: SELECT m.id_method, m.na_method FROM security.method m INNER JOIN security.object o ON m.id_object = o.id_object INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = o.id_module WHERE mo.na_module =$1 AND o.na_object = $2 AND m.na_method = $3
verifyProfile: SELECT id_profile FROM security.profile WHERE de_profile = $1
removePermission: DELETE from security.permission WHERE id_method = $1 AND id_profile = $2
getProfiles: SELECT p.de_profile FROM security.user_profile up INNER JOIN security.user uw ON uw.id_user = up.id_user INNER JOIN security.profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1
hasProfile: SELECT p.id_profile FROM security.user_profile up INNER JOIN security.user uw ON uw.id_user = up.id_user INNER JOIN security.profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1 AND p.de_profile = $2
setProfileUser: INSERT INTO security.user_profile (id_user, id_profile) VALUES ((SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1),(SELECT id_profile FROM security.profile WHERE de_profile = $2))
setQuestionUser: INSERT INTO security.answer (id_question, de_answer , id_user) VALUES ((SELECT id_question FROM security.user WHERE de_question = $1)), $2, (SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $3))
cargarTodasPreguntas: SELECT quest.id_question idQuestion,quest.de_question question FROM security.question quest INNER JOIN security.answer ans ON ans.id_question = quest.id_question INNER JOIN security.user uw ON uw.id_user = ans.id_user WHERE uw.na_user = $1
obtenerDosRespuestas: SELECT ans.de_answer FROM security.answer ans INNER JOIN security.question quest ON  quest.id_question = ans.id_question WHERE quest.id_question IN ($1,$2)
updatePassword: UPDATE security.user SET pw_user = $1 WHERE na_user = $2
getMail: SELECT em_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1
desbloquear: UPDATE security.user SET bl_user = false, at_user = 3 WHERE na_user = $1
selectAllRoute: SELECT rt.id_route, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt
getInfoSeller: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE p.id_person = $1 AND tp.id_tp_person =1
getSellersAZ: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person =1
getSellersRoute: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, ro.id_route, ro.de_route FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN local.local lo ON lo.id_local = pl.id_local INNER JOIN local.route ro ON ro.id_route = lo.id_route INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE ro.id_route = $1 AND tp.id_tp_person =1
getSellerAssignments: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(ag.id_assignment) assignments FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN sell.assignment ag ON ag.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user
sells: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(bi.id_bill) sells FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user
sellsMin: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(bi.id_bill) sells FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row rw ON rw.id_bill = bi.id_bill INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user HAVING COUNT(rw.id_row) < $1
sellsMax: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(bi.id_bill) sells FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row rw ON rw.id_bill = bi.id_bill INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user HAVING COUNT(rw.id_row) > $1
sellsByDate: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(bi.id_bill) sell_day FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 AND bi.da_bill = $1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user
sellsByRangeDate: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, COUNT(bi.id_bill) sell_range FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 AND bi.da_bill BETWEEN $1 AND $2 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user
sellsByAmmount: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, SUM(rw.am_row) mo_vendido FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row rw ON rw.id_bill = bi.id_bill  INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user
sellsByAmmountMin: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, SUM(rw.am_row) mo_vendido FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row rw ON rw.id_bill = bi.id_bill INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user HAVING SUM(rw.am_row) < $1
sellsByAmmountMax: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, p.id_address, su.de_status_user, SUM(rw.am_row) mo_vendido FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person tp ON tp.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row rw ON rw.id_bill = bi.id_bill INNER JOIN security.user se ON se.id_person = p.id_person INNER JOIN security.status_user su ON su.id_status_user = se.id_status_user WHERE tp.id_tp_person = 1 AND bi.id_status_bill = 1 GROUP BY p.id_person, su.de_status_user HAVING SUM(rw.am_row) > $1
desactivateSeller: UPDATE security.user  SET id_status_user = 2 WHERE id_person = $1
activateSeller: UPDATE security.user SET id_status_user = 1 WHERE id_person = $1
insertSeller: INSERT INTO person.person_tp_person (id_person, id_tp_person) VALUES ($1, 1) RETURNING id_person
asignTypeSalarySeller: INSERT INTO person.person_tp_salary (id_person, id_tp_salary) VALUES ($1, $2) ON CONFLICT (id_person) DO UPDATE SET id_tp_salary = EXCLUDED.id_tp_salary WHERE EXCLUDED.id_person = $1
seePendingPayments: SELECT p.id_person id_seller, p.na_person, p.ln_person, bi.id_bill, SUM(ro.am_row) mo_pending FROM person.person p INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person INNER JOIN billing.row ro ON ro.id_bill = bi.id_bill WHERE bi.id_status_bill = 2 GROUP BY p.id_person, bi.id_bill
seePaymentsFromSellers: SELECT p.id_person id_seller, p.na_person, p.ln_person, bi.id_bill, pa.id_pay, pa.am_pay FROM person.person p INNER JOIN billing.bill bi ON bi.id_person_se = p.id_person  INNER JOIN billing.pay pa ON pa.id_bill = bi.id_bill
seePaymentsToSellers: SELECT p.id_person id_seller, p.na_person, p.ln_person, pp.id_pay_person, pp.am_pay_person FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.pay_person pp ON p.id_person = pp.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person_tp_person pt ON pt.id_person = p.id_person WHERE pt.id_tp_person = 1
seBillFromSeller: SELECT bi.id_bill, bi.da_bill, SUM(ro.am_row) mo_bill, bi.id_person_se id_seller FROM billing.bill bi INNER JOIN billing.row ro ON ro.id_bill = bi.id_bill WHERE bi.id_person_se = $1 GROUP BY bi.id_bill
insertPerson: INSERT INTO person.person (na_person, ln_person, nu_person, id_address) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id_person
insertAddress: INSERT INTO person.address (de_address, id_street) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_address
updatePerson: UPDATE person.person SET na_person = $1, ln_person = $2, nu_person = $3, id_address = $4 WHERE id_person = $5
updateAddress: UPDATE person.address SET de_address = $1, id_street = $2 WHERE id_address = $3
insertTypePerson: INSERT INTO person.person_tp_person (id_person, id_tp_person) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_person
getAllPersonWithAddress: SELECT p.id_person, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.nu_person, a.de_address, s.na_street, m.na_municipality, c.na_city, st.na_state, co.na_country FROM person.person p INNER JOIN person.address a ON a.id_address = p.id_address INNER JOIN direction.street s ON s.id_street = a.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality m ON m.id_municipality = s.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city c ON c.id_city = m.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state st ON st.id_state = c.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country co ON co.id_country = st.id_country
selectAllAssignment: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment
selectAssignmentBySeller: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pse.id_person = $1
selectAssignmentByClient: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pcl.id_person = $1
selectAssignmentByNameClientInit: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pcl.na_person LIKE '$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameClientMid: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pcl.na_person LIKE '%$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameClientEnd: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pcl.na_person LIKE '%$1'
selectAssignmentByNameSellerInit: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pse.na_person LIKE '$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameSellerMid: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pse.na_person LIKE '%$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameSellerEnd: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pse.na_person LIKE '%$1'
selectAssignmentByNameProductInit: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pr.de_product LIKE '$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameProductMid: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pr.de_product LIKE '%$1%'
selectAssignmentByNameProductEnd: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pr.de_product LIKE '%$1'
selectAssignmentByNamePresentationInit: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pt.de_presentation LIKE '$1%'
selectAssignmentByNamePresentationMid: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pt.de_presentation LIKE '%$1%'
selectAssignmentByNamePresentationEnd: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pt.de_presentation LIKE '%$1'
selectAssignmentByIdProduct: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pr.id_product = $1
selectAssignmentByIdPresentation: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE pt.id_presentation = $1
selectAssignmentByDate: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE ass.da_assignment = $1
selectAssignmentByRangeDate: SELECT ass.id_assignment, pcl.na_person, pse.na_person, pr.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ass.da_assignment, stass.de_state_assignment FROM sell.assignment ass INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = ass.id_person_cl INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = ass.id_person_se INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = ass.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.state_assignment stass ON stass.id_state_assignment = ass.id_state_assignment WHERE ass.da_assignment BETWEEN $1 AND $2
insertAssignment: INSERT INTO sell.assignment (id_person_cl, id_person_se, id_product_sale, id_state_assignment, da_assignment) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
updateStateAssignment: UPDATE sell.assignment SET id_state_assignment WHERE id_assignment = $1
selectAllProductsSale: SELECT ps.id_product_sale, p.de_product, pt.de_presentation, ps.am_product_sale FROM sell.product_sale ps INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation
selectProductSaleByPresentation: SELECT p.id_product, p.de_product FROM sell.product p INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product = p.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation WHERE pt.id_presentation = $1
selectProductSaleByAmount: SELECT ps.id_product_sale, p.de_product, pt.de_presentation FROM sell.product_sale ps INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation  WHERE ps.am_product_sale = $1
selectProductSaleByRangeAmount: SELECT ps.id_product_sale, p.de_product, pt.de_presentation FROM sell.product_sale ps INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation  WHERE ps.am_product_sale BETWEEN $1 AND $2
selectProductLargerThanAmount: SELECT ps.id_product_sale, p.de_product, pt.de_presentation FROM sell.product_sale ps INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation  WHERE ps.am_product_sale >= $1
selectProductLessThanAmount: SELECT ps.id_product_sale, p.de_product, pt.de_presentation FROM sell.product_sale ps INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product INNER JOIN sell.presentation pt ON pt.id_presentation = ps.id_presentation  WHERE ps.am_product_sale <= $1
selectPresentationByProduct: SELECT pt.id_presentation, pt.de_presentation FROM sell.presentation pt INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_presentation = pt.id_presentation INNER JOIN sell.product p ON p.id_product = ps.id_product WHERE p.id_product = $1
selectAmountByProduct: SELECT ps.am_product_sale FROM sell.product_sale ps WHERE ps.id_product_sale = $1
insertProductSale: INSERT INTO sell.product_sale (id_product, id_presentation, am_product_sale) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
updateProduct: UPDATE sell.product SET de_product = $2 WHERE id_product = $1
updatePresentation: UPDATE sell.presentation SET de_presentation = $2 WHERE id_presentation = $1
updateAmountProductSale: UPDATE sell.product_sale SET am_product_sale = $3 WHERE id_product_sale = $1 AND id_presentation = $2
deleteProduct: DELETE FROM sell.product WHERE id_product = $1 RETURNING id_product
deletePresentation: DELETE FROM sell.presentation WHERE id_presentation = $1 RETURNING id_presentation
selectAllLocalByUser: SELECT lc.de_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person
selectOneLocalByUser: SELECT lc.de_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person WHERE us.na_user = $1
selectOneRouteByUser: SELECT rt.de_route FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person INNER JOIN security.user us ON us.id_person = pp.id_person WHERE us.na_user = $1
insertCountry: INSERT INTO direction.country (na_country) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_country
insertState: INSERT INTO direction.state (id_country, na_state) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_state
insertCity: INSERT INTO direction.city (id_state, na_city) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_city
insertMuni: INSERT INTO direction.municipality (id_city, na_municipality) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_municipality
insertStreet: INSERT INTO direction.street (id_municipality, na_street) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_street
updateMuni: UPDATE direction.municipality SET na_municipality = $1 WHERE id_municipality = $2
updateStreet: UPDATE direction.street SET na_street = $1 WHERE id_street = $2
selectDirectionByRoute: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country  WHERE rt.id_route = $1
selectDirectionByLocal: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_local INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country  WHERE lc.id_local= $1
selectAddressByPerson: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM person.person pn INNER JOIN person.address ad ON ad.id_address = pn.id_address INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = ad.id_street  INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality  INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city  INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state  INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country   WHERE pn.id_person = $1
selectAllDirection: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN direction.street st ON rt.id_street = st.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country
selectAllAddress: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM person.address ad INNER JOIN direction.street st ON ad.id_street = st.id_street  INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality  INNER JOIN direction.city ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city  INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state  INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country
selectRouteByLocal: SELECT rt.de_route, st.na_street, mp.na_municipality FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON lc.id_route = rt.id_route INNER JOIN local.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN local.municipality mp ON mp.id_municipality = st.id_municipality WHERE lc.de_local LIKE '%$1%'
selectAllLocal: SELECT lc.id_local, lc.de_local FROM local.local lc
selectAllRouteAndLocal: SELECT lc.de_local, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route
deleteRoute: DELETE FROM local.route WHERE id_route = $1 RETURNING id_route
deleteLocal: DELETE FROM local.local WHERE id_local = $1 RETURNING id_local
updateLocal: UPDATE local.local SET de_local = $2 WHERE id_local = $1
updateRoute: UPDATE local.route SET de_route WHERE id_route = $1
asignLocalSeller: INSERT INTO local.person_local ( id_local, id_person) VALUES ($1, $2)
selectAllBills: SELECT bl.id_bill id, pse.na_person vendedor, pcl.na_person cliente, st.de_status_bill status, bl.da_bill fecha FROM billing.bill bl  INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = bl.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = bl.id_person_cl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill
selectAllItemsByBill: SELECT rw.id_row id, pr.de_product, rw.am_row FROM billing.row rw INNER JOIN sell.product_sale ps ON ps.id_product_sale = rw.id_product_sale INNER JOIN sell.product pr ON pr.id_product = ps.id_product WHERE rw.id_bill = $1
selectBillBySeller: SELECT bl.id_bill id, pcl.na_person cliente, st.de_status_bill status, bl.da_bill fecha FROM billing.bill bl  INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = bl.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = bl.id_person_cl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill WHERE pse.na_person LIKE '%$1%'
selectBillByClient: SELECT bl.id_bill id, pse.na_person vendedor, st.de_status_bill status, bl.da_bill fecha FROM billing.bill bl  INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = bl.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = bl.id_person_cl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill WHERE pcl.na_person LIKE '%$1%'
selectBillsByDate: SELECT bl.id_bill id, pse.na_person vendedor, pcl.na_person cliente, st.de_status_bill status FROM billing.bill bl  INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = bl.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = bl.id_person_cl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill WHERE bl.da_bill = $1
selectBillsByStatus: SELECT bl.id_bill id, pse.na_person vendedor, pcl.na_person cliente, st.de_status_bill status, bl.da_bill fecha FROM billing.bill bl  INNER JOIN person.person pse ON pse.id_person = bl.id_person_se INNER JOIN person.person pcl ON pcl.id_person = bl.id_person_cl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill WHERE st.de_status_bill = $1
selectTotalByBill: SELECT rw.id_bill, SUM(rw.am_row) total FROM billing.row rw WHERE rw.id_bill = $1 GROUP BY rw.id_bill
selectTotalDebt: SELECT dbt.id_bill idBill, SUM(dbt.am_paid) total FROM billing.debt dbt WHERE dbt.id_bill = $1 GROUP BY dbt.id_bill
selectTotalPaid: SELECT id_bill, SUM(am_pay) total FROM billing.pay WHERE id_bill = $1 GROUP BY id_bill
selectDateLimitToPaidByBill: SELECT da_limit FROM billing.debt WHERE id_bill = $1
selectStatusBillByName: SELECT id_status_bill, de_status_bill FROM billing.status_bill WHERE de_status_bill = $1
selectStatusByBill: SELECT st.de_status_bill FROM billing.bill bl INNER JOIN billing.status_bill st ON st.id_status_bill = bl.id_status_bill WHERE bl.id_bill = $1
selectAllPaidByBill: SELECT p.id_pay, p.am_pay, pmbk.de_pay_method_bank, bk.de_bank, pmo.de_pay_method_other FROM billing.pay p LEFT JOIN billing.pay_bank pb ON p.id_pay = pb.id_pay LEFT JOIN billing.pay_other po ON po.id_pay = p.id_pay LEFT JOIN billing.bank bk ON bk.id_bank = pb.id_bank LEFT JOIN billing.pay_method_bank pmbk ON pmbk.id_pay_method_bank = pb.id_pay_method_bank LEFT JOIN billing.pay_method_other pmo ON pmo.id_pay_method_other = po.id_pay_method_other
selectAllPaidByBillConcat: SELECT p.id_pay, p.am_pay, CASE WHEN pmbk.de_pay_method_bank IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(pmbk.de_pay_method_bank, ', ', bk.de_bank) ELSE pmo.de_pay_method_other END AS payment_method FROM billing.pay p LEFT JOIN billing.pay_bank pb ON p.id_pay = pb.id_pay LEFT JOIN billing.pay_other po ON po.id_pay = p.id_pay LEFT JOIN billing.bank bk ON bk.id_bank = pb.id_bank LEFT JOIN billing.pay_method_bank pmbk ON pmbk.id_pay_method_bank = pb.id_pay_method_bank LEFT JOIN billing.pay_method_other pmo ON pmo.id_pay_method_other = po.id_pay_method_other
selectStatusByMethodPayBank: SELECT st.de_status_method FROM billing.pay_method_bank pmbk INNER JOIN billing.status_method st ON st.id_status_method = pmbk.id_status_method WHERE pmbk.id_pay_method_bank = $1
selectStatusByMethodPayOther: SELECT st.de_status_method FROM billing.pay_method_other pmo INNER JOIN billing.status_method st ON st.id_status_method = pmo.id_status_method WHERE pmo.id_pay_method_other = $1
insertStatusBill: INSERT INTO billing.status_bill (de_status_bill) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_status_bill
insertStatusMethod: INSERT INTO billing.status_method (de_status_method) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_status_method
insertBill: INSERT INTO billing.bill (id_person_se, id_person_cl, id_status_bill, da_bill) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id_bill
insertDebt: INSERT INTO billing.debt (id_bill, am_paid, da_limit) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
insertPay: INSERT INTO billing.pay (id_bill, am_pay) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_pay
insertPayBank: INSERT INTO billing.pay_bank (id_pay, id_bank, id_pay_method_bank) VALUES ((SELECT id_bank FROM billing.bank WHERE de_bank = $1), (SELECT id_pay_method_bank FROM billing.pay_method_bank WHERE de_pay_method_bank = $2), $3)
insertPayOther: INSERT INTO billing.pay_other (id_pay, id_pay_method_other) VALUES ( (SELECT id_pay_method_other FROM billind.pay_method_other WHERE de_pay_method_other = $1), $2)
updateStatusByBill: UPDATE billing.bill SET id_status_bill = $2 WHERE id_bill = $1
updateStatusBill: UPDATE billing.status_bill SET de_status_bill = $1 WHERE id_status_bill = $2
updateStatusMethod: UPDATE billing.status_method SET de_status_method = $1 WHERE id_status_method = $2
reduceDebt: UPDATE billing.debt SET am_paid = am_paid - $1 WHERE id_bill = $2
selectAllMethodBankByStatus: SELECT id_pay_method_bank id, de_pay_method_bank descripcion, id_status_method FROM billing.pay_method_bank WHERE id_status_method = $1
selectAllMethodOtherByStatus: SELECT id_pay_method_other id, de_pay_method_other descripcion, id_status_method FROM billing.pay_method_other WHERE id_status_method = $1
updateStatusMethodBank: UPDATE billing.pay_method_bank SET id_status_method = $1 WHERE id_pay_method_bank = $2
updateStatusMethodOther: UPDATE billing.pay_method_other SET id_status_method = $1 WHERE id_pay_method_other = $2
updateStatusBank: UPDATE billing.bank SET id_status_method = $1 WHERE id_bank = $2
insertRowByIdBillAndDeProduct: INSERT INTO billing.row (id_bill, id_product_sale, am_row) VALUES ( $1, $2, (SELECT ps.am_product_sale FROM sell.product_sale ps WHERE ps.id_product_sale = $2))
updateProductSale: UPDATE sell.product_sale SET id_presentation = COALESCE($1, id_presentation), am_product_sale = COALESCE($2, am_product_sale) WHERE id_product_sale = $3
selectMessageByUserSe: SELECT msg.id_message, usr.na_user, msg.de_message, msg.da_message FROM message.message msg INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se  WHERE usse.na_user = $1
selectMessageByDate: SELECT msg.id_message, tpm.de_type_message, usse.na_user emisor, usr.na_user receptor, msg.de_message FROM message.message msg INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN message.type_message tpm ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message  WHERE msg.da_message = $1
selectMessageByRangeDate: SELECT msg.id_message, tpm.de_type_message, usse.na_user emisor, usr.na_user receptor, msg.de_message FROM message.message msg INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN message.type_message tpm ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message  WHERE msg.da_message BETWEEN $1 AND $2
selectMessageByTypeMessage: SELECT msg.id_message, usse.na_user, usr.na_user, msg.de_message, msg.da_message FROM message.message msg INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN message.type_message tpm ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message  WHERE tpm.de_type_message = $1
selectMessageToTypeByUserRe: SELECT tpm.id_type_message, tpm.de_type_message, usse.na_user, msg.de_message, msg.da_message FROM message.type_message tpm INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN message.message msg ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message  WHERE usse.na_user = $1
orderMessageToTypeByDate: SELECT tpm.id_type_message, usse.na_user, usr.na_user, msg.de_message descripcion, img.de_image, msg.da_message FROM message.type_message tpm  INNER JOIN message.message msg ON msg.id_type_message = tpm.id_type_message INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN message.image img ON img.id_message = msg.id_message ORDER BY msg.da_message
selectUserByMessage: SELECT usse.na_user emisor, usr.na_user receptor, msg.de_message FROM message.message msg INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se WHERE msg.id_message = $1
selectImageByMessage: SELECT de_image FROM message.image WHERE id_message = $1
selectDateByMessage: SELECT da_message FROM message.message WHERE id_message = $1
insertNewMessage: INSERT INTO message.message (id_user_se, id_user_re, id_type_message, de_message, da_message)
insertNewMessageSubconsulta: INSERT INTO message.message (id_user_se, id_user_re, id_type_message, de_message, da_message) VALUES ((SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $1), (SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $2), (SELECT id_type_message FROM message.type_message WHERE de_type_message = $3), $4, $5)
insertNewImage: INSERT INTO message.image (de_image, id_message) VALUES ($1, (INSERT INTO message.message (id_user_se, id_user_re, id_type_message, de_message, da_message) VALUES ( (SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $2), (SELECT id_user FROM security.user WHERE na_user = $3), (SELECT id_type_message FROM message.type_message WHERE de_type_message = $4), $5, $6 ) RETURNING id_message ));
updateMessage: UPDATE message.message SET de_message WHERE id_message = $1
updateTypeMessage: UPDATE message.type_message SET de_type_message WHERE id_type_message = $1
selectMessageByTypeAndUserSe: SELECT msg.da_message fecha, usse.na_user usuario,usr.na_user receptor, msg.de_message contenido, img.de_image image FROM message.message msg LEFT JOIN message.image img ON img.id_message = msg.id_message INNER JOIN message.type_message tpm ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re WHERE (tpm.de_type_message = $1 AND usse.na_user = $2) OR (tpm.de_type_message = $1 AND usr.na_user = $2) ORDER BY msg.da_message
selectLocalByPerson: SELECT pp.na_person, lc.de_local, rt.de_route, st.na_street FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN person.person pp ON pp.id_person = pl.id_person WHERE pp.na_person = '%$1%'
selectLocalByRoute: SELECT pn.na_person, pn.ln_person, lc.de_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN person.person pn ON pn.id_person = pl.id_person WHERE rt.id_route = $1
selectMessageByTypeAndUserSeTimeStamp: SELECT msg.da_message, usr.na_user, msg.de_message, img.de_image FROM message.message msg LEFT JOIN message.image img ON img.id_message = msg.id_message INNER JOIN message.type_message tpm ON tpm.id_type_message = msg.id_type_message INNER JOIN security.user usse ON usse.id_user = msg.id_user_se INNER JOIN security.user usr ON usr.id_user = msg.id_user_re WHERE ((tpm.de_type_message = $1 AND usse.na_user = $2) OR (tpm.de_type_message = $1 AND usr.na_user = $2)) AND msg.ts_message > $3 ORDER BY msg.da_message
